basics.name: Andres Otarola Alvarado
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary:
Software engineer with over 12 years of experience, specializing in full-stack development, technology innovation, and automation.

 At XOPS, I played a key role in building the foundation of the event-driven architecture currently used in the platform, while also architecting platform-level solutions, including automated deployments, test coverage automation, and tools for best practices like linters and code formatters.

 I like to make hard things easy thus enhancing the developer experience to deliver delightful features to customers efficiently. I thrive in teams of highly skilled professionals who are committed to continuous improvement and mutual support.
